title: Christmas at Beacon Hill Fort
description: Aden, after a life of crime thinks that he and his family are now finally safe and settled in sleepy Tunbridge Wells until a stranger with dead eyes walks into his print shop with an ultimatum that he dare not ignore... So how far would you go to protect your family and will the ghosts of the hanged witches of Harwich help Aden with his new murderous quest?
author: Gerald Neal
